description: predominantly red and black square textile with multicolored, embroidered design in center; embroidered design against black background; panel has red border; along three of the four edges is a tasseled fringe; two of the edges have a purple tasseled fringe while the other edge has a yellow tasseled fringe; back of mirror cover has black and tan floral pattern along with a smaller strip of cloth with a red and tan floral pattern
title: Mirror cover
